BitCloud Stack API Reference 1.11.0
Data Fields
APS_TxOptions_t Struct Reference

Describes additional options of data transmission. More...

#include <aps.h>

Data Fields

uint8_t reserved:4
uint8_t fragmentationPermitted:1
uint8_t acknowledgedTransmission:1
uint8_t useNwkKey:1
uint8_t securityEnabledTransmission:1

Detailed Description

Describes additional options of data transmission.

The structure is used to set additional parameters for a data request such as

  • to request for acknowledgement assign acknowledgedTransmission to 1
  • to enable fragmentation assign fragmentationPermitted to 1
  • to enable security assign securityEnabledTransmission to 1
  • to use network key in the request assign useNwkKey to 1

The structure conforms to the primitive defined in ZigBee Specification r18, Table 2.2, page 25.

Definition at line 64 of file apsdeData.h.

Field Documentation

uint8_t APS_TxOptions_t::reserved

Reserved. Should always be zero.
